tasks.label: git-commit-and-push
args: git add -A; git commit -m "feat(admin): secure service-role update path for breeds; switch edit save to API; add admin middleware+auth context; align schema to 'group' and fix hydration/params; add SQL helpers"; git push

tasks.label: git-commit-and-push-2
args: git add -A; git commit -m "feat: admin-secure breed updates and fixes"; git push

tasks.label: git-status-check
args: git status -s; git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD; git log -1 --oneline

tasks.label: git-commit-safe
args: git commit -m "chore: commit admin-secure breed update flow and related fixes"
